reviews.review: Good Game but currently on 2020 if u want to play it without some cheaters u will have to play Face It rather than matchmaking.

Great game, really enjoy the team based aspect of the game. The mechanics of the game are pretty good. The only negative about the game is that there can be several cheaters even in prime matchmaking and I also believe the trust factor system is broke as well, but overall well worth the buy and the hours.
Gra bardzo dobra gdy się gra na serwerach typu faceit/esportal (tick124,mnie dzieci,lepsi gracze).

After many years of playing this game i can finally say that i dont recommend it. To be frank it fucking sucks. The last many months of playing i've met nothing but russians and shitty teammates. 1 Thing i never understood is why valve didnt fucking regionlock the damn russians, dont they realize they are ruining the game for everyone else? So spare yourself the headache and dont buy this shitty game
